titles.title: Public Lands and Waters Climate Leadership Act of 2022
Public Lands and Waters Climate Leadership Act of 2022

To require the Secretary of the Interior and the Chief of the Forest Service to align management of public lands and waters with the President's greenhouse gas emission reduction goals, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Public Lands and Waters Climate Leadership Act of 2022
This bill addresses greenhouse gas emissions, including by restricting fossil fuel leasing and permitting on public lands.
